Subject: Re: My Decepticons/Brotherhood-Hell Beast Battle
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

have fun, Good night everyone else

BIC:

Motormaster floats off of Astroblast and starts to speak into his
comm-link, "Decepticons, Retreat." he then looks to the Elementals, "Until
next time" he whispers under his breath.

Wildrider plumets to the ground, and just before he hits, he transforms,
and races off in car mode, Speedbreaker puts Dead-End's remains inside of
Astroblast, and pats him, as if to say, go, he then Mimicks Wildrider.
Motormaster gets into Astroblast, then turns around once, and fires out
"Blast it"  he screams, then he sends a fist into one of Astroblasts walls,
out of fury, "Ill kill that Maximal. You know Astroblast, Im starting to
hate Maximals as much as I do Autobots". In the corner, the small pile of
pink metal gestures his hands in agreeince.
